item.description:
The Department of Fish & Game and The Division of Fisheries & Wildlife invite you to celebrate their most recent wildlife habitat acquisition and the Commonwealth’s protection of 100,000 acres of open space since 2007 with:

  • Special Guest Governor Deval Patrick
  • Secretary of Energy and Environmental Affairs Richard K. Sullivan
  • Department of Fish & Game Commissioner Mary Griffin
  • A.D. Makepeace Company President and CEO Michael P. Hogan
  • State and Local Conservation Partners.

Thursday, August 23rd at 10:30 a.m. 43 West Long Pond Road, Plymouth MA

Directions: From Rt. 3 southbound take Exit 3 (Clark Road) ▪ At the end of the ramp, turn right onto Clark Road then take the first left onto Long Pond Road ▪ Stay on Long Pond Road for about 1.6 miles, then turn right onto Halfway Pond Road. After you pass the Faunce Community Church (about 0.8 miles), take a right onto West Long Pond Road (unpaved) -- Watch for signs and balloons on the left just after mailbox

(OR HIKE OVER WITH OUR THURSDAY HIKERS STARTING AT 9:00 FROM THE UPPER COLLEGE POND LOT in MYLES STANDISH STATE FOREST. See the other Meetup today.)

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Celebrate 100,000 Acres of Conservation Land
